Creator: Henderson, E., artist
Description: A three-quarter length depiction of Kaiser Wilhelm II, bowing before four British civilians grouped around a table. The two men sit smoking cigars, whilst the two women are adorned with jewelry.

Title: Are you in league with the Kaiser?
